title: "Study suggests cannabis use during pregnancy could cause lifelong cognitive deficits for offspring"
excerpt: "While previous research has shown that prenatal cannabis exposure can obstruct the normal growth of a fetus, the long-term impacts on brain development are still unknown. Western researchers are now providing fresh insight into this area,"
